desctiption: A JSON schema describing array log visual
title: 2D Log Visual

ClassName.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.
ClassName.title: Class Name

colorprovider.description: A class which provides the color for te specified value
colorprovider.title: Color Provider

offsets.description: An array of the offsets, or a number which is applied to everything

minangle.description: The minimum angle displayed by this log
minangle.title: Min Angle

maxangle.description: The maximum angle displayed by this log
maxangle.title: Max Angle

autoanglelimits.description: Defines if the angles should be calculated automatically by the data.
autoanglelimits.title: Auto Angle Limits

wrapinterpolation.description: True if values should interpolate from max angle to min angle
wrapinterpolation.title: Wrap Interpolation

rowsinterpolation.description: Type of interpolation for the rows
rowsinterpolation.title: Rows Interpolation

plotmode.description: The plot type defines the interpolation type for columns
plotmode.title: Plot Mode

desctiption: A JSON schema describing abstract log visual
title: Abstract Log Visual Schema

linestyle.title: Line Style
linestyle.description: The styling of the lines in this visual

position.description: A value of geotoolkit.welllog.LogBlock Position enum
position.title: Position

barlinestyle.description: Bar Line Description. TODO: fix this description
barlinestyle.title: Bar Line Style

displayunit.description: The unit of measure displayed for the curve
displayunit.title: Display Unit

gradientlinestyle.description: The gradient if applied to the curve
gradientlinestyle.title: Gradient Line Style

interpolationtype.description: The type of interpolation applied to the curve
interpolationtype.title: Interpolationtype

limitstype.description: The type of limits used when calculating the limits
limitstype.title: Type of Limits

microposleft.description: allows application code to display the curve in a subarea of the track
microposleft.title: Micro Position Left

microposright.description: allows application code to display the curve in a subarea of the track
microposright.title: Micro Position Right

nullvaluesymbolvisible.description: Flag to change visibility of null value symbol
nullvaluesymbolvisible.title: Null Value Symbol Visible

outofrangevalues.description: Display out of range values flag
outofrangevalues.title: The Out of Range Values

symboldecimationstep.description: The step of decimation of symbols
symboldecimationstep.title: Symbol Decimation Step

textdecimationstep.description: The step of decimation of displayed text
textdecimationstep.title: Text Decimation Step

textreference.description: Type of the text to be put on the track
textreference.title: Text Reference

textstyle.description: The styling of the text on the curve

wrapping.description: Flag to enable wrapping based on if you want to see the clipped part of the track or not
wrapping.title: Wrapping

displaymode.description: Display mode (any combination of values: 'line' and 'text', or an empty array)

fillinfo.description: An object containing properties defining the fills of the curve
fillinfo.title: Fill Info

codes.description: Code by which the fill style for the section is assigned
codes.title: Codes

ranges.description: List of ranges to color of fill
ranges.title: Ranges

items.description: Each range is defined by an array containing two numbers: start and end

colorprovider.description: A class which is able to provide the color for requested value
colorprovider.title: Color Provider

defaultfillstyle.description: The fill style to apply if a fill style for the region is not specified in the arrays
defaultfillstyle.title: Default Fillstyle

filltype.description: An enum that defines the type of fill mechanism which is used to fill the curve.
filltype.title: Fill Type

textstyle.description: The style of the text drawn over the fills
textstyle.title: Test Style

textposition.description: The position of the fill label
textposition.title: Text Position

interpolationtype.description: An enum defining the type of algorithm used to interpolate the fills
interpolationtype.title: Interpolation Type

title: Log Fill
description: Schema describing the class which handles filling in between logarithmic curves

curve1.description: A curve or a reference to a curve to fill from
curve1.title: Curve 1

curve2.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.
curve2.title: Curve 2

fillstyle.description: The style of the fill applied in between curves, or a reference to a style

filltype.description: The type of the fill to apply
filltype.title: Fill type

negativefillstyle.description: The style style of the negative fill
negativefillstyle.title: The Negative Fill Style

positivefillstyle.description: The style style of the positive fill
positivefillstyle.title: The Positive Fill Style

colorprovider.title: Color Provider
colorprovider.description: The class which provides the color related to a value.

renderbackground.title: Render Background
renderbackground.description: Defines if the background must be rendered before the gradient fill is rendered

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: The opacity index of the gradient fill

datasource.title: Data Source
datasource.description: The class providing data for the log curve

colorrange.title: Color Range
colorrange.description: The range of colors described by the gradient.

majorlinestyle.description: The line style of the major ticks of the grid, or a reference to another line style
majorlinestyle.title: Major Line Style

minorlinestyle.description: The line style of the minor ticks of the grid, or a reference to another line style
minorlinestyle.title: Minor Line Style

tickgenerator.title: Tick Generator
tickgenerator.description: Used to calculate major and minor lines positions

linescount.description: Number of lines in the grid
linescount.title: Number of Lines

scale.description: The scale factor of the grid
scale.title: Scale

offset.description: The offset of the grid from the base line
offset.title: Offset

step.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.
step.title: The Step Schema

bounds.description: Bounds of the visual in parent coordinates
bounds.title: The Bounds Schema

intermediate.description: Flag defining the visibility of minor lines in the grid
intermediate.title: Intermediate Lines
